verbs.description: russia elite [V: spetsnaz] special operators are about to get new ilenced mortar systems a suppressed mortar system would prove a major boon to spetsnaz special operations forces by reducing the visual and auditory indicators that might give away their firing position pentagon assault burevestnik institute russian ministry of defense aberdeen proving grounds ak 47 mortar united states army u s army ak-47 jane akmb defense technical information center ministry of defence russia russia
